title: Navigate to the first breadcrumb link in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link.
assertion1: Role of the landmark region, 'navigation', is conveyed
assertion2: Name of the landmark region, 'Breadcrumb', is conveyed
assertion3: 'Role of the breadcrumbs container, 'list', is conveyed
assertion4: Number of list items, 4, is conveyed

assertion2: Name of the landmark region, 'Breadcrumb', is conveyed
assertion3: 'Role of the breadcrumbs container, 'list', is conveyed
assertion4: Number of list items, 4, is conveyed
